LyraDB Binary Distribution
Version: 1.0.0
Release Date: December 2024

Compiler Information:
- Windows: MSVC 19.44 (Visual Studio 2022)
- Linux: GCC 11.2 (or compatible)
- macOS: Clang 14.0 (or compatible)

Build Configuration:
- C++ Standard: C++17
- Optimization Level: -O2 / /O2
- Runtime: Dynamic (MSVC Runtime for Windows)
- Static Linking: zlib, compression libraries

Supported Architectures:
- Windows: x64 (AMD64)
- Linux: x64 (AMD64)
- macOS: x64 (Intel), ARM64 (Apple Silicon)

Build Date: December 17, 2024
